Emerging growth company&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; Securities registered pursuant to Section&nbsp;12(b) of the Act: &nbsp; Title of each class &nbsp;&nbsp; Trading Symbols &nbsp;&nbsp; Name of each exchange on which registered Class&nbsp;A Common Stock Class&nbsp;B Common Stock &nbsp;&nbsp; BRK.A BRK.B &nbsp;&nbsp; New York Stock Exchange New York Stock Exchange &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; ITEM 2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. On May&nbsp;4, 2019, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. issued a press release announcing the Company&#146;s earnings for the first quarter ended March&nbsp;31, 2019. A copy of this press release is furnished with this report as an exhibit to this Form 8-K. ITEM 5.07 Submission of Matters to a Vote of Security Holders On May&nbsp;4, 2019, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. held an annual meeting of its shareholders. The only matter to be acted on at the meeting was the election of directors. Berkshire&#146;s shareholders reelected all of Berkshire&#146;s directors in an uncontested election. Following are the votes cast for and against each director. &nbsp; Proposal 1 &#150; Election of Directors &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; For &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; Against &nbsp; Warren E. Buffett &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 577,817 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 13,395 &nbsp; Charles T. Munger &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 579,791 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 11,421 &nbsp; Gregory E. Abel &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 580,917 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 10,295 &nbsp; Howard G. Buffett &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 579,800 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 11,412 &nbsp; Stephen B. Burke &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 572,135 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 19,078 &nbsp; Susan L. Decker &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 583,438 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 7,774 &nbsp; William H.
